casebody.data:
Frank COLE, Appellant, v. POSTAL-TELEGRAPH CABLE COMPANY, Appellee. No. 5534. Circuit Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. Jan. 18, 1930. W. L. Willie, of Paris, Tex., for appellant. William C. Pitts, of Birmingham, Ala. (William C. Eitts and William C. Pitts, Jr., both of Birmingham, Ala., on the brief), for appellee.

Before WALKER, BRYAN, and POSTER, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The judgment is affirmed.
